stories.text:
Howdy HN,

I have a few ideas I’m considering hiring contractors to bootstrap, however I need help on how to protect myself, my ideas, and code from the contractors I hire. I know I can hire an attorney, but I was wondering if there are any resources around common contracts to use as a starting point?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Resources for Contractor Contracts?
Once Again, Environmentalists Are Sabotaging Climate Progress

stories.text: I've been trying to understand how various common objects, say, a light switch or a suitcase, are manufactured if we thought about the entire process starting from raw materials. Where do all necessary materials come from for the final assembly? How are those materials manufactured? If we follow down the line, how many dependencies does manufacturing a light switch have and what are they? I recently realized that all these steps are very much invisible to consumers and I'd love to learn more. Any recommendations where to look?
stories.title: Ask HN: How many dependencies does manufacturing a light switch have?
